data.name: iVRy Driver for SteamVR (Mobile Device Premium Edition)
data.detailed_description:
Before you start

IMPORTANT:

When using the iVRy Driver for SteamVR for the first time, it MUST be started from the "Launch" button, to ensure any additional services and drivers it requires get installed.


Download the app

In order to use the iVRy Driver for SteamVR, you will need to download the 'iVRy' app from your Mobile Device's app store.


About the Game

What is the iVRy Driver for SteamVR (Mobile Device Premium Edition) DLC?


• It is the FULL version of the iVRy Driver for SteamVR with Mobile Device support. This is equivalent to purchasing the "Premium" Edition in-app purchase in the Apple App Store or Google Play Store. If you have purchased the "Premium" Edition via one of these stores, you should not purchase this DLC.

What is iVRy?


• iVRy is an app for your Mobile Device, with a Virtual Reality headset driver for SteamVR.

What does that mean?


• Want to play PC VR* (Virtual Reality) titles without having to buy a dedicated VR headset?
• With iVRy, a compatible iOS or Android Mobile Device and VR headset you can!
• Supports Wired (USB) connections for greater visual quality and performance.
• Supports Wireless (Wifi) connections for greater mobility.
• Automatically adjusts quality to maintain optimal frame rates on all connection types.
• User configurable quality and performance options.
• User configurable vignette options.
• Use your VR headset manufacturer's Cardboard QR code for optimal lens distortion correction and field-of-view.
• Integrates with SteamVR, so no 'manager' / 'server' apps or additional configuration required.
• Includes SteamVR Dashboard overlay, to change driver settings in VR.
• Built-in support for NoloVR 6DOF tracking and motion controllers.
• Compatible with most HTC Vive and Oculus Rift** titles.
• Upgrade to "Premium" edition via Steam DLC or In-App Purchase to remove the limitations of the "Lite" edition.

* Valve OpenVR/SteamVR. Requires Valve Steam & SteamVR on Windows 7 or later.
** Oculus Rift titles require Valve SteamVR, Oculus Home & 3rd party 'LibreVR Revive' software.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
